extendedInfo.description: Discover Islam The portable Islamic knowledge index for your Android. Get one touch access to latest Islamic Articles, Audios, Videos and Holy Quran Recitations and share some of the great topics and wisdom with friends and family.Taking advantage of the favorites option really allows you to personalize your discover Islam. Use it to create a play list of  audio, video or Recitations. And the best thing is, once you've already added  to your favorites. NO longer need a network connection to access your Favorites' contents. â¢ Download: Download media through the app to copy to other devices. â¢ Share: A list of all sharing tools (e-mail, SMS, Twitter and Facebook, etc.) to share Articles, Audio, Video and Holy Quran Recitations

reviews.title: Good work
reviews.comment: Mashaallah. Thnx a lot for bringing this. Nothing in this app works without network. It would be great if few sections like articles, texts opens without depending on network. Anyways 5 stars for this exellent idea n  implementation.
reviews.author: azmathulla khan

reviews.title: Abd\'ALLAH Sharief
reviews.comment: Good and beautiful info on ISLAM. Especially the article \"Inner dimensions of pilgrimage Hajj\" is worth reading for entire ummah.  JazakALLAHu Khair. ALLAH KAREEM.!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app mashallah
reviews.comment: Great app but needs updates.there hasnt been a new article or video since ages
reviews.author: Haris a.rehman

reviews.title: Very impressed.
reviews.comment: Surprisingly easy to navigate for an app that provides so much content.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really good app and plenty of info on Islam thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great app, looks good and the knowledge seems very relevant especially for Muslims in the west  BarakAllah feek
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: salam alaikom
reviews.comment: Very nice app, May Allah reward you all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excelent app. Very informative
reviews.comment: Jazakalah. May Allah repay you all many times   Amin
reviews.author: Salim Shaabani

reviews.title: Install now !!!!!
reviews.comment: This app is Awesome with loads of usefull information it does exactely what its called...helps u discover Islam XD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: A great app for non muslims trying to learn about Islam. It tells the story/evidence of Jesus\'s prophethood and many more proofs and evidence of Islam.  But there\'s a slight lagging especially when downloading the recitation and videos. Please fix. Jazakallah hu khairan for the app! Will definitely share it to my friends! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Be educated
reviews.comment: MashaAllah.  I love this app cse its really good for Muslim and non Muslim to know a lot more about Islam its got a lot of information including Quran with English translation. May Allah reward u for making time to create this app and educate others.  Jazakallah.
reviews.author: Sity Kemal

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Massa Allah,  one of the best apps,  certainly this will open the eyes of non believers  to search for the eternal truth. May Allah forgive us and show us the correct path.
reviews.author: Fowzul Ameer

reviews.comment: Fantastic,  thought me more about islam thanks :D. May Allah (s.w.t) be pleased with you (all) who helped make this brilliant app (Ameen)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it love it love it
reviews.comment: Love it love it love it love it

reviews.title: Ahkhani
reviews.comment: I Luv This Apparently, I Can Read & understand As I Want:) Laa ilaaha illa Allah. O Allah, I WorShip You & only You Allah... MaSha Allah Aameen:)

reviews.title: Beautiful

reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
reviews.comment: This app is beautiful, with a lot of very useful aspects. As a recent revert, i was kind of hoping for a bit of beginner\'s Arabic, but this is still the best app EVER. May Allah bless you for your efforts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.comment: Excellent App Shukran!!!
